name: Time Flies (Dinnae Ken Games)
description:
The Time Flies have been causing mischief, can you help restore time to the town of Tiktokton?

This is a hidden object game with a simple art style and a single level, a nice wee 5 minute experience at most.

This game was made in 48 hours for Moray Game Jam 2018. This was a one-person development, first game jam and first released game.

----------------------------------------------------

Download the zip, extract all files, and launch the game with the Time Flies.exe application.

----------------------------------------------------
